The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King (video game)

wikitext.*:
'''Roger Labon Jackson''' is an American voice actor. He is best known for providing his voice as [[Wikipedia:Ghostface|Ghostface]] in [[Wikipedia:Scream (franchise)|Scream (film series)]].

==Roles==
* [[2014]]: ''[[Middle-earth: Shadow of Mordor]]'': [[Saruman]]
* [[2006]]: ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Battle for Middle-earth II]]'': Additional voices
* [[2004]]: [[The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King (video game)|''The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King'' (video game)]]: Additional voices
